name: Soy Sauce (간장)
note: Usually contains wheat unless labeled gluten-free.

name: Gochujang (고추장)
note: Often contains wheat; check labels for GF versions.

name: Doenjang (된장)
note: Some brands include wheat; verify ingredients.

name: Buckwheat (메밀)
note: Gluten-free by itself but cross-contact is common in noodle shops.

name: Rice Cakes (떡)
note: Base is rice, but fillings/sauces may contain gluten.

name: Malt Syrup (물엿)
note: May be derived from barley; avoid unless verified.
